com.jme3.renderer

Interface GL1Renderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Renderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LwjglGL1Renderer

    public interface GL1Renderer
extends Renderer
    Renderer sub-interface that is used for non-shader based renderers.

    The GL1Renderer provides a single call, setFixedFuncBinding(com.jme3.material.FixedFuncBinding, java.lang.Object) which allows to set fixed functionality state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFixedFuncBinding(FixedFuncBinding ffBinding, java.lang.Object val)
      Set the fixed functionality state.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.jme3.renderer.Renderer

    • Method Detail

      • setFixedFuncBinding

        void setFixedFuncBinding(FixedFuncBinding ffBinding,

        Set the fixed functionality state.

        See FixedFuncBinding for various values that can be set.
